snippet.title: MECHANOPHAGIA — Action Roguelite, Bullet Hell (Launch Trailer)
snippet.description:
Mechanophagia is a challenging bullet hell shooter with roguelite elements, set in a dark and gritty sci-fi world. Blast through waves of fleshy aberrations and defeat monstrous bosses. Can you outmaneuver the relentless enemy onslaught and save the robots from their inevitable extinction?

Available on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2757540/Mechanophagia/
